comments.comment: I cannot find variable label_channels, do you mean we should rename cls_out_channels to label_channels?

I cannot find variable label_channels, do you mean we should rename cls_out_channels to label_channels?
yes, because the function defined in has keyword parameter , see this <denchmark-link:https://github.com/open-mmlab/mmdetection/blob/432c33206465d2526b097c28de57aad48090b1b7/mmdet/core/anchor/anchor_target.py#L15>line</denchmark-link>
It is a bug. Thanks for reporting!
